control.label: [B]$VAR[FirstLabelVar][/B]
control.visible: Skin.HasSetting(NetFiixHideFilmInfo) + [Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(sets) + IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(clearlogo))] | [Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) + [IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(tvshow.clearlogo)) + IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(clearlogo))]]

[[[Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(sets)] + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixLandscapeView)] | [[Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes)] + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixTVPosters)]] + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixCenterList) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixLowerInfo)

[System.IdleTime(5) + Control.HasFocus(800) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtras) + !StringCompare(ListItem.Label,..) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtrasDelay_5)] | [System.IdleTime(10) + Control.HasFocus(800) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtras) + !StringCompare(ListItem.Label,..) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtrasDelay_10) ] | [System.IdleTime(20) + Control.HasFocus(800) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtras) + !StringCompare(ListItem.Label,..) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtrasDelay_20)] | [System.IdleTime(30) + Control.HasFocus(800) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtras) + !StringCompare(ListItem.Label,..) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtrasDelay_30)]

animation.condition: Control.IsVisible(800) + Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixOpenCase) + [!IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) | !IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(Set.Movie.1.Art(discart))) | Skin.HasSetting(Fakedischandwriting)| Skin.Hassetting(fakediscart)] + !Skin.HasSetting(clearcases) + Container.Content(movies) + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixCenterList) + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixCenterFocus)

Control.IsVisible(800) + Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixOpenCase) + [!IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) | !IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(Set.Movie.1.Art(discart)))] + Skin.HasSetting(clearcases) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixCenterList) + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixCenterFocus)

Control.IsVisible(800) + Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixOpenCase) + [!IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) | !IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(Set.Movie.1.Art(discart)))] + !Skin.HasSetting(clearcases) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixCenterList) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixCenterFocus)

Control.IsVisible(800) + Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixOpenCase) + [!IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) | !IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(Set.Movie.1.Art(discart)))] + Skin.HasSetting(clearcases) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixCenterList) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixCenterFocus)

Control.IsVisible(800) + Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixOpenCase) + [!IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) | !IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(Set.Movie.1.Art(discart))) | Skin.HasSetting(Fakedischandwriting)| Skin.Hassetting(fakediscart)] + !Skin.HasSetting(clearcases) + Container.Content(movies) + !Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixCenterList)

Control.IsVisible(800) + Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixOpenCase) + [!IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) | !IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(Set.Movie.1.Art(discart))) | Skin.HasSetting(Fakedischandwriting)| Skin.Hassetting(fakediscart)] + !Skin.HasSetting(clearcases) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixCenterList)

Control.IsVisible(800) + Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixOpenCase) + [!IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) | !IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(Set.Movie.1.Art(discart))) | !IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(poster))] + Skin.HasSetting(clearcases) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixCenterList)

control.label: [COLOR $VAR[FocusTextureColorVar]]Plot[/COLOR]
control.visible: [Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(sets)] + Skin.HasSetting(NetFiixHideFilmInfo) + [[Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtrasDelay_5) + System.IdleTime(30)] | [Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtrasDelay_10) + System.IdleTime(40)] | [Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtrasDelay_20) + System.IdleTime(50)] | [Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtrasDelay_30) + System.IdleTime(60)]]

[Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(sets)] + Skin.HasSetting(NetFiixHideFilmInfo) + [[Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtrasDelay_5) + System.IdleTime(30)] | [Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtrasDelay_10) + System.IdleTime(40)] | [Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtrasDelay_20) + System.IdleTime(50)] | [Skin.HasSetting(KodiFlixExtrasDelay_30) + System.IdleTime(60)]]
